detectors.description: Contract Gold_Core_Finance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gold_Core_Finance.sol#14-75) is not in CapWords

Gold_Core_Finance.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gold_Core_Finance.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Gold_Core_Finance.sol#16)
